General.Name: Jaya Tiasa Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Jaya Tiasa Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the extraction and sale of logs in Malaysia. It operates through four segments: Oil Palm, Oil Mill, Logs Trading, and Others segments. The company is also involved in the development of oil palm plantations and planted forests; palm oil processing and related activities. In addition, it provides air transportation services; management services; and fabrication and workshop services. The company owns interests in 83,483 hectares of oil palm plantation land area in the state of Sarawak, Malaysia; and manages 120,395 hectares of reforestation land area. Further, it is involved in the cultivation and trading of birds' nests; development and maintenance of planted forests; forest plantation and logging contracting activities; marketing of timber logs; and production and trading of coconut seedlings. The company also exports its products to India, Korea, Japan, Taiwan, and other countries. Jaya Tiasa Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 1960 and is based in Sibu, Malaysia.
